org.bytedeco.javacpp.Skia.sk_paint_t

  • Packages that use Skia.sk_paint_t 
    Package Description
    org.bytedeco.javacpp  

    • Uses of Skia.sk_paint_t in org.bytedeco.javacpp

      Methods in org.bytedeco.javacpp that return Skia.sk_paint_t 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Skia.sk_paint_t Skia.sk_paint_clone(Skia.sk_paint_t arg0) 
      static Skia.sk_paint_t Skia.sk_paint_new()
      Create a new paint with default settings: antialias : false stroke : false stroke width : 0.0f (hairline) stroke miter : 4.0f stroke cap : BUTT_SK_STROKE_CAP stroke join : MITER_SK_STROKE_JOIN color : opaque black shader : NULL maskfilter : NULL xfermode_mode : SRCOVER_SK_XFERMODE_MODE
